menu.name: Greek Salad
menu.description: Our delicious salad is served with Feta cheese and peeled cucumber. Includes tomatoes, onions, olives, salt and oregano in the ingredients.

menu.name: Bruschetta
menu.description: Delicious grilled bread rubbed with garlic and topped with olive oil and salt. Our Bruschetta includes tomato and cheese.

menu.name: Pasta
menu.description: Penne with fried aubergines, cherry tomatoes, tomato sauce, fresh chilli, garlic, basil & salted ricotta cheese.

menu.name: Lemon Dessert
menu.description: You can't go wrong with this delicious lemon dessert!
